This phase bridges the gap between design and coding. You'll create detailed implementation plans, break features into small tasks, and create trackable issues.


Why is this important?

> - Makes work visible and trackable
> - Enables progress measurement
> - Helps with time estimation
> - Supports parallel work by multiple developers
